ygData.msgSnippet: I dunno about the space thing, how are they going to implemen it? ... _________________________________________________________________ The new MSN 8: advanced
ygData.messageBody:
I dunno about the space thing, how are they going to implemen it?


>From: Su <suceress@...>
>Reply-To: EverQuest@yahoogroups.com
>To: EverQuest@yahoogroups.com
>Subject: [EverQuest] Everquest: Lost Dungeons of Norrath
>Date: Wed, 18 Jun 2003 17:31:43 -0500
>
>So, another expansion pack is coming out. The features listed look pretty
>cool.
>I'll be interested to see how they are implemented and how they work in the
>game.
>Anyone else looked at the webpage and have any thoughts on this?
>I love the idea of being able to unlock, open, or bash open chests and
>such.
>That is something I feel was missing from this game. And the private space
>sounds good too.
>Thoughts?
>luv,
>-Su
